review_blob: Pours a light purple color with little head. The aroma and flavor are strong with cherries. Palatable and smooth, there is a slight acidity on the finish.
Pours honey yellow with a thick, creamy head. Citrus aroma; flavor has grape, citrus and nutmeg notes. Very effervescent. Overall a good Hefe.
I think this ale is somewhat underrated. The aroma and appearance are a bit bland, but it has a remarkably smooth flavor and finish. Probably my favorite ale.
Utterly repugnant. The experience of drinking this beer is only worth enduring if one is desperate for alcohol.
Vibrant texture, smooth taste, clean finish. One of my personal favorites.
